data.title: Como Park Rentals & Reservations
data.meta_description: About Como Park For over one hundred years, Como Park has played a vital role in meeting the recreational needs of residents of Saint Paul and surrounding
data.text:
General Information

Facilities and Activities

Como Regional Park Map

Return to Park Permits & Rental Information

Como Midway Picnic Pavilion

Location: 1199 Midway Parkway, 55103 (Como and Midway Parkway) (East Picnic Grounds)

Open sided with wrought iron fencing, adjoining picnic pavilions that can be rented separately or as one. Each side seats approximately 125 people. Both sides have a kitchen with a gas stove (no oven), sinks, electricity and a serving counter. The south side has a walk-in cooler (no freezer) and the north side has a commercial size refrigerator with a freezer. Each side has a large barbeque grill located behind the kitchen area. There is also a separate restroom building at the site. Please Note: Groups with an estimated attendance of more than 150 people will be required to reserve the entire pavilion.

Alcohol: The possession and consumption of non-intoxicating and intoxicating malt liquor (containing not more than 5.5% alcohol by weight) is permitted from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. within the designated picnic areas. Glass beverage containers are not allowed.

Virtual Tour

Como Picnic Shelter

Location: Midway Parkway near Hamline Avenue, 55103 (West Picnic Grounds)

Seats approximately 50 people. The shelter has electricity and a large double grill. A restroom, play area and drinking fountain are nearby. Note: The maximum size group that picnic permits will be issued to for this shelter is 99 people. No tents are allowed in the West Picnic Grounds.

Alcohol: The possession and consumption of non-intoxicating and intoxicating malt liquor (containing not more than 5.5% alcohol by weight) is permitted from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. within the designated picnic areas. Glass beverage containers are not allowed

Rental Rates

Image Gallery

Como Streetcar Station

Location: 1224 North Lexington Parkway, 55103

The Streetcar Station is a heated and air-conditioned facility available to rent Memorial Day through Labor Day. The building is equipped with tables and chairs. The setup of tables and chairs is the responsibility of the permit holder. Take down of the tables and chairs will be done by Parks staff after rental is completed.

Reservations for the Como Streetcar Station ONLY: City of Saint Paul residents and businesses may apply for a permit the first business day of the month, 13 months in advance of their desired event date. Non-residents and businesses may apply beginning the first business day of the month, 12 months in advance of their desired event date.

Alcohol: The possession or consumption of alcohol is prohibited at this facility.

Building capacity is a maximum of 75 people. Please take note of the following:

The space has a maximum setup capacity for 50 people using tables and chairs. This does not include space for display/serving tables.

Auditorium style-seated events (with chairs only) have a maximum setup capacity of 75 people. This does not include space for display/serving tables.

Como Lakeside Pavilion

For information on rentals for private events or meetings, visit the Como Lakeside Pavilion website.

Como Zoo Picnic Plaza

Located within the Como Zoo grounds at 1225 Estabrook Drive. Como Zoo is home to over 125 species of animals. Host your next picnic at Como Zoo Picnic Pavilion and your guests will enjoy a deliciously catered meal in Como's private picnic shelter. The Como Zoo Picnic Pavilion offers a beautiful private setting and a covered pavilion for group events. The Como Zoo Picnic Plaza is available for rental every day from May through October. The Plaza is rented two times per day from 10:30 am – 1:30 pm and from 2:30 pm – 5:30 pm. Contact Lancer Catering at 651-487-8282 for more information.

Como Woodland Outdoor Classroom Permits

Visit the Como Woodland Outdoor Classroom website for permitting information or contact the Permit Office at parkspermits@ci.stpaul.mn.us or (651) 266-6400.

Como Park Zoo & Conservatory

Visit the Como Park Zoo & Conservatory website for more information.

Ball Field Rentals

Como Ball Fields

To rent one of the four ball fields located north of Horton Ave at Como Regional Park, contact Parks Permit Office at parkspermits@ci.stpaul.mn.us or (651) 266-6400​.

McMurray Fields

To rent facilities at McMurray Athletic Fields, contact the Municipal Athletics office at 651-558-2255, email ​fieldrentals@ci.stpaul.mn.us or visit the facility rentals website for more information. Bike and Water Craft Rentals

For information on kayak, canoe, pedal boat, paddle board, and Surrey Bike rentals on Lake Como, visit the Wheel Fun website.
